nodes.text: Sylas Wilkes was a Human male individual during the Cold War.

Sylas was the first mate of the pirate Andronikos Revel until he guided a mutiny against his captain. Later, he was stationed on Tatooine, and was able to recover an artifact of the ancient Sith Lord Tulak Hord. He and his bodyguards were defeated by the Sith Inquisitor Kallig.
